blocks.subject: ILA Commercial Terms
text: I suggest that you all start without me.  I'm going to be absent for the
weeks with the competition, work and vacation.  After that time, I'll be
to do whatever needs to be done.

blocks.subject: Meeting for Group Project Author: "Vavrek; Carolyn (US - San Francisco)" <SMTP:cvavrek@deloitte.com>
text: When would everyone like to get together to discuss?  Maybe we could all do
a little research and then meet (or conference call) early next week to

blocks.subject: Group Project--E221
raw_header: Cc: Anil Sama; Mark Guinney; Cvavrek
text: Our group consists of Jeff Dasovich, Mark Guinney, Anil Sama and Carolyn
We propose to examine the recently failed acquisition by Coke of Quaker
Oats:  Why merge?  What was the value?  Upside?  Downside?  Why did it go
bust?  Should it have gone through?  What's up with this Buffet guy,
If you have any concerns with this proposal, please let us know.
Finally, if possible, we'd like to present on Thursday, April 26th.
- This message (including any attachments) contains confidential information
